entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 9:52 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:52 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023
